How to win every match with 30 fps or less : 
1. Buy P90
2. Scream into mic with a russian accent to rush B
3. Rush B and spray and pray
4. Die and shout cyka blyat

This game has come a LONG way, for better and for worse....

I have pumped many hours into this game and i am still shit at it, and i don't care honestly. Its fun to play with friends and offers a competitive  atmosphere that most games don't have. 

I'm glad that Valve "sord-of" cares about the community and i do agree that the free-to-play shit is god awful but i digress.

Gud Game but need to Git Gud first.....
The best game ever that steam builded it..

A fun casual game to relax with. Easy to pick up and has a great community. Everyone is very friendly and helpful.
This review is worth part of a badge, maybe? Steam's sales aren't really interesting anymore.
